channel.title: Azoulay, Pierre on Chege's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Azoulay, Pierre on Chege's Blog

item.title: Startup Ideation
item.description: How to Get Startup Ideas Err on the side of having competitors, but make sure that you have a thesis that everyone else is overlooking, e.g. Google wasn’t averse to users leaving google.com ASAP. The Startup Idea Matrix, ( B2B Edition , B2C Edition ) is a good start for knowing who to google. Big companies tend to be slow at changing their approach.
